text: María de la Encarnación Paso Ramos (25 March 1931 – 18 August 2019), better known as Encarna Paso, was a Spanish actress.Schwartz p.183 She was born in Madrid. She was known for her role as Elena in the movie Begin the Beguine (1982). Paso died on 18 August 2019 in Madrid at the age of 88 from pneumonia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Actors from Madrid Category:Deaths from pneumonia
title: Encarna Paso
